    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AppContext
    Provides a centralized context for accessing shared resources and services throughout the application.
    ApplicantModel
    Represents an Applicant user in the BTO Management System.
    ApplicantView
    Handles the user interface and interactions for users with the Applicant role.
    ApplicationController
    Handles requests related to BTO project applications, acting as an intermediary between the user interface (views) and the application logic (ApplicationService).
    ApplicationRepo
    Manages the storage and retrieval of BTO application data.
    ApplicationService
    Contains the core logic for managing BTO applications.
    ApplicationStatus
    Represents the possible states of a BTO application throughout its lifecycle.
    AuthController
    Controller for handling authentication-related operations.
    AuthService
    Provides simple utility methods for checking user roles.
    BookingDetailModel
    Represents the details of a flat booking made by an applicant.
    BTOApplicationModel
    Represents a single application submitted by a user for a specific BTO project.
    BTOProjectModel
    Represents a BTO (Build-To-Order) project with details such as project name, neighborhood, flat counts, application dates, and managing officers.
    CSVReader
    Utility class for reading data from CSV files.
    EnquiryController
    Controller for handling enquiry-related operations.
    EnquiryModel
    Represents a question or enquiry submitted by an applicant about a specific BTO project.
    EnquiryRepo
    Manages the storage and retrieval of enquiry data.
    EnquiryResponseModel
    Holds the response provided by an HDB staff member to an applicant's enquiry.
    EnquiryService
    Provides services for managing enquiries related to BTO projects.
    FlatType
    Represents the different types of flats available in BTO projects.
    HDBManagerModel
    Represents an HDB Manager user in the BTO Management System.
    HDBManagerView
    Handles the user interface and interactions for users with the HDB Manager role.
    HDBOfficerModel
    Represents an HDB Officer user in the BTO Management System.
    HDBOfficerView
    Handles the user interface and interactions for users with the HDB Officer role.
    InitializationController
    Controller responsible for initializing the application state, such as loading data from CSV files into repositories.
    InitializationService
    Service responsible for initializing application data from external sources (e.g., CSV files).
    Main
    The main entry point for the BTO Management System application.
    mainAppView
    The main view class responsible for the initial user interaction, including displaying the main menu, handling login, and registration.
    Neighborhood
    Represents the different neighborhoods where BTO projects can be located.
    NRICValidator
    Utility class for validating NRIC numbers
    OfficerRegistrationController
    Controller for handling officer registration-related operations.
    OfficerRegistrationModel
    Represents a registration request submitted by an HDB Officer to manage a specific BTO project.
    OfficerRegistrationRepo
    Manages the storage and retrieval of officer registration application data.
    OfficerRegistrationService
    Service responsible for handling the logic related to HDB Officer registration requests for managing projects.
    OfficerRegistrationStatus
    Represents the possible states of an HDB Officer's registration request to manage a project.
    PasswordValidator
    Utility class for validating password complexity requirements.
    ProjectController
    Controller for handling project-related operations.
    ProjectManagementController
    Controller for handling project management operations.
    ProjectManagementService
    Service responsible for handling the business logic related to managing BTO projects, including creation, editing, deletion, and visibility toggling.
    ProjectRepo
    Manages the storage and retrieval of BTO project data.
    ProjectService
    Service responsible for handling logic related to viewing BTO project information.
    ProjectView
    Provides views related to BTO projects, primarily focusing on displaying projects with filtering capabilities and showing the project currently managed by a user.
    ProjectViewFilterModel
    Represents a model for filtering projects based on Neighborhood and flat type.
    Receipt
    Represents a receipt generated for a BTO application, typically after successful booking.
    RepoInterface<T,ID>
    A blueprint for repository classes, defining standard ways to manage data.
    ReportingController
    Controller for handling reporting-related operations.
    ReportingService
    Service responsible for generating various reports based on application and project data.
    UserController
    Controller for handling user-related operations like login, registration, and password reset.
    UserModel
    Abstract base class representing a user within the BTO Management System.
    UserRepo
    Manages the storage and retrieval of user data (UserModel and its subclasses).
    UserRole
    Contains the different roles a user can have within the BTO Management System.
    UserService
